description:
A year after Log4Shell dashed all our vacation plans the dust still hasn't settled. More than 25% of downloads from Maven Central are for vulnerable versions of Log4J. 

Is that you? Many think they're safe but it's a false assumption.  In this session, we'll explore the technical, business and individual aspects behind these assumptions.


We'll explain how you could be deceived into wishful thinking and how to counter the effects with practical guidance and appropriate tools


As developers we have a big part to play in keeping our applications safe - learn some simple techniques here and maybe reduce those holiday blues
title: How to avoid the next Log4Shell - easy steps every developer can take right now
